```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#| label: lectura
df_pernoctaciones <- read_csv2("~/../Downloads/2941 (1).csv", locale = locale(encoding = "latin1"))

df_pernoctaciones <- janitor::clean_names(df_pernoctaciones)
```

```{r}
df_series <- df_pernoctaciones |>
  mutate(
    periodo = paste0(periodo, "D01"), 
    periodo = as.Date(periodo, format = "%YM%mD%d"), 
  total = parse_number(total, locale = locale(grouping_mark = "."))
  ) |> 
    group_by(comunidades_y_ciudades_autonomas, periodo) |> 
    summarise(pernoctaciones = sum(total, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop")
```

```{r}
ggplot(df_series) + 
  geom_line(aes(x = periodo, y = pernoctaciones)) + 
  facet_wrap(~ comunidades_y_ciudades_autonomas, scales = "free_y")

```
